examples: She wants to go into teaching (= make it a career).
Quiere dedicarse a la docencia (= convertirla en una carrera).
He has now retired from full-time teaching
Ahora se ha retirado de la enseñanza a tiempo completo.
The course combines classroom teaching and distance learning.
El curso combina la enseñanza en el aula y el aprendizaje a distancia.
How much teaching do you actually do?
